dict.acceptation: 居住于，布满；使住满人，在…殖民；把动物放养在；

sent.orig: Compare person, persons, people and peoples.
Maybe, some people, some people are unscathed, While some people, some people salvation.
sent.trans: 或许，有的人，是有的人的劫数；而有的人，就是有的人的拯救吧。

sent.orig: Stupid people talk about people, Average people talk about things, Intelligent people talk about ideas.
sent.trans: 愚昧的人谈论他人﹐平凡的人谈论事﹐聪明的人讨论构想。

sent.orig: The Chinese people are great people and the American people are great people too.
sent.trans: 中国人民是伟大的人民，美国人民也是伟大的人民。

sent.orig: Rich people admire other rich and successful people, poor people resent successful rich people.
sent.trans: 富有的人崇拜其他富有而成功的人，穷人憎恨成功的富人。
